headline: Truist Boosts Salesforce, Inc. (CRM) Price Target to $380, Citing AI-Driven Growth and Innovation
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 15 Buzzing AI Stocks Making Headlines. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Salesforce, Inc. (NYSE:CRM) stands against the other buzzing AI stocks. Power needs for artificial intelligence and cloud computing are expanding so rapidly that some data center campuses may use more electricity […]

headline: US Thanksgiving online sales up about 4% so far this year, data shows
summary: Online sales in the U.S. were up about 4% for the first half of the Thanksgiving holiday, compared to a 2% rise last year, Salesforce data showed on Thursday, a fresh sign that shoppers are lapping up...
